locks.name: Metroid Room 4 Gray Lock (to Tourian Hoppers)

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Rinka
note: Kill or lure and freeze the Metroid down lower in the room off camera.
One simple setup to position a Rinka is to stand or crouch a couple tiles away from the edge of the runway and freeze the Rinka from the right spawner.
It is possible maintain a half-tile gap between the Rinka and the runway in order to extend it as far as possible.

strats.name: Crystal Flash (Come In Normally)
note: To avoid heavy Rinka damage, perform the Crystal Flash while backed against the left door or inside the open door frame.
Lay the Power Bomb immediately after destroying the Rinka with the closer spawn location.

strats.name: Crystal Flash (Metroids Dead or Frozen)
note: To avoid heavy Rinka damage, perform the Crystal Flash while backed against the left door or inside the open door frame.
Lay the Power Bomb immediately after destroying the Rinka with the closer spawn location.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Rinka
G-Mode Morph Power Bomb Metroid Kill
note: Kill the Metroids while artificially morphed without any movement items.
With just 5 Power Bombs, place one on the first platform to kill some Rinkas and to lure a second Metroid.
Place a second in the same region, then drop down and quickly place a third on the second platform and fall to the third platform while the first two Metroids die.
The remaining two Power Bombs can safely placed here to kill the final Metroid.
Note that it is necessary to exit G-Mode before exiting the room in order for the Metroids to remain killed.
devNote: FIXME: It may be possible to kill the Metroids starting at the bottom door.
It is possible, but quite difficult to do this with 4 Power Bombs.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph Crystal Flash Light Orb Metroid Kill
note: On entry, Crystal Flash, then lure the Metroids to the light orb.
Note that it is necessary to exit G-Mode before exiting the room in order for the Metroids to remain killed.
To do this, trigger Reserves on a Rinka below, or first damage down with some of the Metroids before killing them.
To minimize damage taken, lure a Rinka away from its spawner before touching it to prevent multiple hits during the auto Reserve trigger.

strats.name: Three Power Bomb Kill (Top to Bottom)

requires.notable: Three Power Bomb Kill (Top to Bottom)

note: Group the Metroids by descending the room.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Harder Evade
strats.note: Run under the top Metroid then roll beneath the second and third.

strats.name: Top Metroid Avoid
note: Avoid all of the Rinkas and Metroids with no equipment and taking no damage.
One way to do this is to bait the top Rinkas to fire upwards, and then carefully spinjump around each corner as the Metroid below passes by.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Taking a rinka hit stops the Metroid damage for a while and is less damage.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Temporary Blue
note: Use X-ray immediately after shinecharging, in order to be able to dodge the Rinkas.
Use spring ball to bounce through the 3-tile-high portion.
devNote: It might technically be possible to get through the 3-tile-high part without Spring Ball, but this probably isn't really viable?

strats.name: Tank and Three PB Kill
note: Climb to the middle section and kill all three Metroids while taking damage.
Or use a tricky jump morph into the bottom left corner of room to kill all three Metroids from the bottom section.

strats.name: Tank and Six PB Kill
strats.note: Move to the middle section after the first Metroid has died to kill the remaining two.

strats.name: Bottom Metroid Avoid (Six Power Bomb Dodge Kill)

requires.notable: Bottom Metroid Avoid (Six Power Bomb Dodge Kill)

note: Take out the lower two Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.
Then Kill the remaining one with three more Power Bombs.

strats.name: Bottom Metroid Avoid (Three Power Bomb Dodge Kill)
note: Move to the left side of the lowest section and jump morph before placing the Power Bomb to kill all three Metroids.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Bottom Metroid Avoid (Traverse Room)
note: Avoid all of the Rinkas and Metroids with no equipment and taking no damage.
Begin by shooting the bottom Metroid hold it in place, and wait right below the first ledge.
Once the middle Metroid passes by, jump up and shoot any Rinkas that are in the way.
Repeat for the next ledge, clear any Rinkas, and then run to the door.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Taking a rinka hit stops the Metroid damage for a while and is less damage.
strats.devNote: Avoiding Rinkas is more difficult than getting hit, so it is not important to know to want to get hit.

strats.name: Shinespark
devNote: This strat is not useful in-room, but can satisfy a strat in the room before with an exit shinespark.
This requires the Metroids to be killed, because otherwise Samus will be grabbed on entry, and the other 2->1 strats won't work.

strats.name: Ice Moonfall Door Lock Skip
note: Use two frozen Rinkas to clip down past the door shell.
Time the Rinkas to be at correct heights by killing both, starting with the higher Rinka.
Freeze the lower Rinka where it is slightly inside the door shell for the moonfall to fall all the way through without any additional input.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: If alive, the Metroids do up to 78 damage before the Rinka hits. Entering through the middle of the door will require less damage.

notables.name: Bottom Metroid Avoid
note: Avoid all of the Rinkas and Metroids with minimal equipment and taking no damage.
Depending on room entry, it may be necessary to shoot to delay the bottom metroid.
Being able to lead the bottom two metroids into favourable positions so that they can be jumped over, while still avoiding every Rinka, is key.

notables.name: Three Power Bomb Kill (Top to Bottom)
note: Group the Metroids by descending the room.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

notables.name: Top Metroid Avoid
note: Avoid all of the Rinkas and Metroids with no equipment and taking no damage.
One way to do this is to bait the top Rinkas to fire upwards, and then carefully spinjump around each corner as the Metroid below passes by.

notables.name: Bottom Metroid Avoid (Six Power Bomb Dodge Kill)
note: Take out the lower two Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.
Then Kill the remaining one with three more Power Bombs.
